entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Marble Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 03:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
